folder: Hylan Boulevard & Sharrott Road, Staten Island, NY
text:
Hylan Boulevard, south side, east of Sharrott Avenue, showing the Princes Bay Lighthouse. It is situated on a U. S. Government reservation, on the Princes Bay shore.
Summer, 1924
5g SgSE..
Eg: OD

folder: Hylan Boulevard & Sharrott Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
Hylan Boulevard, north side, between Sharrott Avenue and Ottilie Street, showing St. Joachim and St. Ann's Roman Catholic Church, and the Main Building (left) of Mount Loretto.
1924
P. L. Sperr
(2)
Another view of the church and (right) St. Joseph' Asylum
for Blind girls, at a later date.
June 27, 1932.
N. L. Sperr
(3)
The Mount Loretto Children's home.
1923.
P. L. Sperr
